product_name: The North Face Mica 1 Footprint - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Made from tough nylon, The North Face Mica 1 footprint protects your tent floor from punctures and tears, and extends the life of the floor. Can be used for fly-only pitching with your Mica 1 Tent, so you can cut down on weight in summer and set up just poles, fly and footprint. The North Face Mica 1 footprint is cut precisely to fit the Mica 1 tent. Closeout.
short_description: Made from tough nylon, The North Face Mica 1 footprint protects your tent floor from punctures and tears, and extends the life of the floor.
